# On-site Mobile Shredding Services
Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Solicitation Information

Reference Number: PW-22-01018427
Amendment Number: 0
Solicitation Number: 202300803/B

## Contract Details

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking secure on-site or mobile paper and/or material document destruction services. The contract will be for one year, with an option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods. The anticipated start date is February 20, 2023.

## Security Requirements

* Contractors must be escorted at all times when within RCMP space.

## Evaluation Criteria

* Bidders will be selected based on the lowest bid.

## Tender Submission

* Tender submissions must be sent to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit via [connie.wright@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:connie.wright@rcmp-grc.gc.ca).
* For more information, please refer to the attached tender documents.

## Important Notes

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
* The RCMP has published its National Procurement Plan and has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

## Contact Information

Connie Wright
Procurement Officer, Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
National Headquarters
73 Leikin Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2
Phone: 613-791-9647
Email: [connie.wright@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:connie.wright@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)

## Tenders

Tenders may be submitted in either English or French and must be sent to Connie Wright via email. Please refer to the attached tender documents for more information. The approval process will be based on the lowest bid.

## Publishing Office

Documents may be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at http://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders. Canada will post amendments, including significant enquiries received and their replies, using GETS.
